title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: The Vinewood Club Phone App – Claim Destroyed Vehicles
content:
The Vinewood Club iFruit App rewards loyal GTA+ Members with the ability to claim all their destroyed Personal Vehicles at once, completely free of charge.

To explore this new feature, open the Phone, go to The Vinewood Club App, and select “Claim Destroyed Vehicles.” All claimed vehicles will be sent to the last garage where they were stored.
